abstract: John A. Paulson, whose company has never before bought another company outright, said he was always enamored with Steinway pianos.
snippet: John A. Paulson, whose company has never before bought another company outright, said he was always enamored with Steinway pianos.
lead_paragraph: Updated, 9:16 p.m. | John A. Paulson, the hedge fund billionaire, already owns three Steinway & Sons pianos: the medium model M grand, the larger model O and the nearly seven-foot-long model B, together worth tens of thousands of dollars.

headline.main: To His Collection of Steinways, Hedge Fund Titan Adds Their Maker
headline.print_headline: To His Collection of Steinways, Hedge Fund Titan Adds Their Maker
